title: Pricing Plans
subtitle: Choose the level of support that fits your business. Custom solutions are available on request.

plans.name: Start
features: Email support and answers to questions

plans.name: Pro
plans.description: For small companies starting to work with Ukraine
features: Up to 3 suppliers with basic verification
Translation and communication with Ukrainian side

plans.name: Business
plans.description: For companies requiring in-depth support and project assistance
features: Up to 5 verified suppliers with reports
Market research tailored to your product

plans.name: Custom
plans.description: Fully customized solution for your project
